attributes.action: ensure that no exempions are provided to the Roman Catholic Church or any other group with regard to the provision of equal access to gay and lesbian people regarding adoption
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
What matters in adoption is the provision of loving homes for children in need: this is not reflective of the sexuality of the parents.
No religious organisation working in this or any other field in public service should be able to discriminate against gay and lesbian citizens

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
